outputs.output_descr: 1) Biophysical assessment (biodiversity, land degradation, climate change and variability sources and opportuities identified; 2. Policy and institutional assessment undertaken; 3. Information and baseline soci-economic conditions and opportunities for income generating  and protected area financing activities identified;

project_descr: The project is supporting to develop full size project proposal on protected areas for natural resource conservation and management.
project_title: Integrated Semenawi and Debubawi Bahri-Buri-Irrori- Hawa
